sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am an undergraduate Software Engineering student and a self-taught programmer, focused on building a solid foundation in software development.
I aspire to be part of the technological world, gain practical experience and continue to develop professionally in the field of software development.

I am committed to constantly learning and improving skills such as teamwork, effective communication and problem solving, with the goal of overcoming challenges and contributing to innovative projects.
